meanings.definition: A plural form of the word 'haaf'.
meanings.sent1: The farm had many haafs grazing in the field.
meanings.sent2: The haafs in the zoo were playful and curious.
meanings.sent3: The haafs decided to have a party in the barn.
meanings.sent4: The haafs stood together like a united family.
meanings.sent5: The colorful haafs stood out among the other animals.

meanings.definition: A possessive form of the word 'haaf'.
meanings.sent1: The haafs' tails were wagging happily.
meanings.sent2: I found the haafs' nest hidden in the bushes.
meanings.sent3: The haafs' secret treasure was finally discovered.
meanings.sent4: The haafs' eyes sparkled with excitement.
meanings.sent5: The haafs' songs echoed through the forest.

meanings.definition: A verb form of the word 'haaf'.
meanings.sent1: She loves to haafs around the garden every morning.
meanings.sent2: The children haafs happily in the playground.
meanings.sent3: The puppy likes to haafs after its tail.
meanings.sent4: The birds haafs from tree to tree in search of food.
meanings.sent5: The squirrel haafs up and down the tree trunk.

meanings.definition: An adjective form of the word 'haaf'.
meanings.sent1: The haafs cat purred softly on the windowsill.
meanings.sent2: The haafs flowers bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The haafs sky was painted with shades of pink and orange.
meanings.sent4: The haafs sunset cast a warm glow over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The haafs puppy wagged its tail happily.
